messages.subject: Tsuba and Fittings Sale
messages.msgSnippet: Group, I need to reduce my inventory of tsuba and fittings. To do so I have created a web site giving an idea what is available. For those of you who do not
messages.messageBody:
Group,

I need to reduce my inventory of tsuba and fittings. To do so I have created a web site giving an idea what is available. For those of you who do not get to the sword shows here is your chance to see what I have. All items have inspection/return option, If you do not know me please inquire, many of the list members have known me for years. Please take a look, for additional pictures descriptions email me at nixe@...


http://www.freewebs.com/tsuba4sale/

Thanks for looking

Mark Jones
nixe@...

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
